cards: What if you won the lottery tomorrow? Share the first three things you'd buy
What if you could switch lives with someone here for a week? Say who it would be and why
What if you had to delete one app on your phone forever? Reveal which one it would be and explain
What if you had to marry your celebrity crush? Name them and describe your first date
What if you could only eat one food for the rest of your life? Share your choice
What if you could read minds? Say whose mind you'd read in this room and why
What if you were invisible for a day? Reveal what you'd do
What if you could time travel to any moment in your past? Share the moment and what you'd change
